select * from member
and instr(member_email, #{memberEmail}) > 0
and instr(member_name, #{memberName}) > 0
and instr(member_nick,#{memberNick}) >0
and instr(member_contact, #{memberContact})>0
and to_date(member_birth, 'YYYY-MM-DD') between to_date(#{memberBirthBegin} || ' ' ||'00:00:00','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and to_date(#{memberBirthEnd} || ' ' ||'23:59:59', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:24:MI:SS')
and to_date(member_birth, 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= to_date(#{memberBirthBegin} || ' ' ||'00:00:00','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
and to_date(member_birth, 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= to_date(#{memberBirthEnd} || ' ' || '23:59:59', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
and member_gender in
#{Gender}
and member_level in
#{Level}
order by
${order}

and to_date(moim_time, 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= to_date(#{moimTimeEnd} || ' ' || '23:59:59' 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')

and moim_gender_check in
#{GenderList}

#{StateList}

${order}
